pages.text: $(tool)Fortune$() increases the amount of items dropped from blocks that have variable drop counts.$(br2)Works identically to the vanilla Fortune enchantment, but can be stacked with it for even greater yields!

pages.title: Primary Material
pages.text: $(a)Emerald$() grants $(tool)Fortune +1$()$(br2)The classic material for wealth and prosperity!

pages.title: Affected Blocks
pages.text: Fortune increases drops from:$(li)Coal, Diamond, Emerald, Lapis$(li)Redstone, Quartz$(li)Crops (Wheat, Carrots, Potatoes)$(li)Melon slices$(li)Nether Wart$(li)Glowstone dust

pages.title: Stacking
pages.text: $(important)Fortune stacks with enchantments!$()$(br2)Fortune III enchanted pickaxe + Fortune II from jewels = Fortune V total$(br2)$(o)Watch those diamonds multiply!$()
